pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTracing Shim for OpenTelemetry==================================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-opentracing-shim.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-opentracing-shim/Installation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-opentracing-shimReferences----------* `OpenTracing Shim for OpenTelemetry <https://opentelemetry-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/shim/opentracing_shim/opentracing_shim.html>`_* `OpenTelemetry Project <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_
